text: Neuralink Corporation is a company that likes to connect human brains with machines for helping people that * can not see well * can not move arms or legs. ==History== In 2016 Elon Musk and 7 other people created Neuralink. In 2021 a monkey played Pong using a Neuralinked brain. On January 29, 2024, Musk said that Neuralink had successfully implanted a Neuralink device in a human on the day prior. Musk said the patient is recovering, and added "Initial results show promising neuron spike detection".--> ==References== Category:Elon Musk Category:American technology companies
title: Neuralink
